data.backend-required: Not all necessary data were transferred. Please check your input.

business.primary: The focus is on classic tariff rides in cooperation with the 40100 dispatch service in Vienna. Transport of pets, foldable wheelchairs, strollers, golf bags, and other bulky cargo possible as well.
business.secondary: In addition, I also handle special trips such as courier services and errand trips, flat-rate trips to Vienna or the airport, and long-distance trips to any address domestically and abroad. Long-distance trips are carried out by prior arrangement and under favorable conditions. Furthermore, I offer hourly rentals for city tours and golf trips, optionally including joint play (my handicap: -12.3).

private.first: In the first 21 years after graduating from school, I worked as an engineer both domestically and abroad.
private.second: I then changed careers, worked for 3 years as a limited partner (ger: "Kommanditist") at Maxi-Autovermietung and as a chauffeur at Taxi Göring. After successfully passing the entrepreneur's exam, I founded my own taxi company in 1999 as an EPU (single-person enterprise) and run the taxi business continuously in 1-shift operation.

content.entry0: Daily starting business hours: 04:00 - 12:00 (off-time on request)
content.entry2: Elevated seat positions for senior friendly entrance/exit

highlights.ev: mobility by Skoda Enyaq iV 80 since 2020

info.text:
- 'Destination' service NÖ allows max 1 address within Vienna.
 - if the option for returning to pickup address is selected, latency must not be bigger than 6h.
- max. 3h latency with costs.
info.title: Please note that

labels.back2home: I want to return to my pickup address.
labels.latency: My required time between arrival and return.

info.text:
- tenancy can be ordered for min 3h and max 24h.
- 25 km per hour of rental time are included and cost 40,00 EUR. Additional costs for driving to/from your pickup/dropof address will be charged seperately.
info.title: Please note that

placeholder.note: Add your personal note if required.
placeholder.title: e.g.: Ing.

order.latency-calc: Waiting times: 24,00 EUR for the first hour and 12,00 EUR for each additional hour. Every 1/2 hour started is charged.
order.licence: Price calculation based on licensed Vienna taxi rate!
order.surcharge-fuel: I accept that additional costs per kilometer for boost charging (DC) will become due for a distance more than 250 km (EUR 0,07/km after 250th km).
order.surcharge-parking: I accept that additional costs for road charges and/or parking will become due if necessary.
order.tenancy-calc: 25 km per hour of rental time are included. Each additional kilometer costs additionally 0,50 EUR.
order.terms: I agree that I have already reached the age of 18 and provide my personal data only for the purpose of contracting the service. Furthermore, I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of total cost in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours. If payment is refused, a report will be filed.
order.terms-flatrate: I accept that canceling my order is free only up to 24 hours before the desired time of departure (with taxi). I have to pay 50% of the currently calculated costs ({{fieldValue}},00 EUR) in case of cancelation or unexcused absence within these last 24 hours.
order.warnings: Actual duration and/or distance can vary due to unexpected traffic, construction sites or road accidents.
